text: Hi everyone, I'm Michael from Switzerland and i'm new to the HubSpot Developer Slack. I'm startet to work with HubSpot and doing all the certificates in parallel. At the momen i'm working also on a project to integrate some other tools to HubSpot. Looking forward to working with you guys. Thanks and have a good one.

Greetings, new to HubSpot and 1st question - apologies if this is the wrong channel...

I have 2 CRM accounts one for prod and one for dev/test.  I figured out how to export the properties definitions for each (taken from prod), however, I am unable to figure out how to import the definitions in to our dev/test CRM.  Not looking to get company/customer data, just the property definitions ...
You're likely going to need to use the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> for this use-case
Hi can anyone help me out on repeater modules? I'm having an extremely difficult time on them
what is it that's the problem?

<@U01EHATCSTB> repeater modules basically create an array of the group/property. You can access them using a for loop. For example, if you have a repeater group with "title" and "content" attributes:

{% for item in module.groups %}
{{ item.title }}
{{ item.content }}
{% endfor %}
this will cycle the groups until it reaches the end. However, be aware that variables declared inside the loop aren't accessible outside of it.
